org.axiondb.engine
Class BaseDiskTable

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.axiondb.event.BaseTableModificationPublisher
        |
        +--org.axiondb.engine.BaseTable
              |
              +--org.axiondb.engine.BaseDiskTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
RowSource, Table
Direct Known Subclasses:
DiskTable
public abstract class BaseDiskTable
extends BaseTable
implements Table

Abstract base disk-resident implementation of Table. BaseDiskTable manages the column meta-data for a disk-based table.

Version:
$Revision: 1.6 $ $Date: 2003/05/20 17:59:10 $
